channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Marcus Tay
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Marcus Tay

item.title: Regression Task: Property Prediction Application
item.description: Formulated the Business Question Transformed and analyzed the dataset to identify features correlated to target variable. Developed the R-script â€“ Transform & EDA, Split, Pre-process, Fit, Tune and Assess. Conducted model evaluation and found the best recipe and model with lowest RMSE score. Produced a reproducible R Markdown report ready for presentation to business users with an Executive Summary.

item.title: Classification Task: Stroke Prediction Application
item.description: Created a predictive tool to that determines the likelihood of a person being diagnosed with stroke based on their lifestyle and health measurements. Preprocessing was conducted to identify the important lifestyle variables that contributes to stroke. Random Forest and XG Boost algorithms Created a reproducible report for business decision-makers with R Markdown Deployed a user-oriented dashboard that can be made available for the public using Shiny.
